title: Ponder: Point Cloud Pre-training via Neural Rendering

Hexplane: A fast representation for dyna.ref_texts: [21] Di Huang, Sida Peng, Tong He, Xiaowei Zhou, and Wanli Ouyang. Ponder: Point cloud pre-training via neural rendering. arXiv preprint arXiv:2301.00157 , 2022. 2
Hexplane: A fast representation for dyna.1: Various explicit representations have been inves-tigated, including sparse voxels [14, 34, 59, 66], low-rank components [5, 7, 31, 51], point clouds [4, 21, 79, 92, 96] and others [8,36,43,68,90].
